info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cumberland and central Prince Edward Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andersonville, or near Buckingham, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Prospect around 525 PM EDT. Farmville and Guinea Mills around 545 PM EDT. Hampden Sydney around 550 PM EDT. Longwood University around 555 PM EDT. Rice around 600 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Kingsville, Raines Tavern, Briery Creek Lake, Tuggle, Reeds, Angola, Stoddert, McRae, Moran and Hawk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
